title: Remove empty Team section H2 from About page

requirements.summary: Remove the selected (currently empty) Team section header H2 element from AboutPage JSX entirely, leaving surrounding Team section content unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria:
The Team section header block in frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx no longer contains the empty

...

element (it is removed from the JSX entirely).
No 'Meet Our Team' heading text (or any other text from that H2) is visible in that section.
All other content in the Team section (the paragraph text and team member rows) remains unchanged and still renders.

file_operations.description: Delete the specific <h2> element in the Team section header block corresponding to XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[3]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h2[1]. Apply changes only to this element; keep the Team section paragraph and TeamMemberRow list unchanged, and do not introduce any backend changes.
